title: Pending Jobs >= 1 for 15 minutes
description: Get notified when Nomad has observed jobs in pending status for more than 15 minutes.

definition.message:
Observed jobs in pending status for > 15 minutes.

This can be caused by one (or more) of the following scenarios:

- Nomad can't find resources to schedule a job
- A job is repeatedly exiting and being scheduled again
- Many jobs are being scheduled normally, but in a short period
definition.name: [Nomad] Pending Jobs >= 1 for 15 minutes
